hibernate-mapping.query: select oca from omis.caseload.domain.OfficerCaseAssignment oca where oca.offender = :offender and oca.officer = :officer and oca.dateRange.startDate = :startDate and (oca.dateRange.endDate = :endDate or (oca.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null)) order by oca.dateRange.startDate desc NULLS FIRST, oca.dateRange.endDate desc

select oca from omis.caseload.domain.OfficerCaseAssignment oca where oca.offender = :offender and oca.officer = :officer and oca.dateRange.startDate = :startDate and (oca.dateRange.endDate = :endDate or (oca.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null)) and oca != :excludedOfficerCaseAssignment

select oca from omis.caseload.domain.OfficerCaseAssignment oca where oca.offender = :offender and ((oca.dateRange.startDate >= :startDate and (oca.dateRange.startDate < :endDate or :endDate is null)) or ((oca.dateRange.startDate <= :startDate) and (:startDate < oca.dateRange.endDate or oca.dateRange.endDate is null)))

select oca from omis.caseload.domain.OfficerCaseAssignment oca where oca.offender = :offender and ((oca.dateRange.startDate >= :startDate and (oca.dateRange.startDate < :endDate or :endDate is null)) or ((oca.dateRange.startDate <= :startDate) and (:startDate < oca.dateRange.endDate or oca.dateRange.endDate is null))) and oca != :excludedOfficerCaseAssignment
select oca from omis.caseload.domain.OfficerCaseAssignment oca where oca.officer = :officer and oca.dateRange.startDate <= :date and (oca.dateRange.endDate > :date or oca.dateRange.endDate is null)
